goal.ch:
1. Introduction  to key topics
2. Key Topic No.1: Two pathways of solar system formation
3. Key Topic No. 2: Dynamics and time scales of planetary accretion
4. Key Topic No. 3   Origin and evolution of comets
5. Key Topic No. 4  :Gas and dust composition of comets
6. Key Topic No. 5 Geomorphology of comets
6. Key Topic No. 6  Subsurface and interior structures of comets
7. Key Topic No. 7:  Relation between comets and asteroids
8. Key Topic No. 8:Interstellar objects
9, Key Topic No. 9 Future projects and space missions to comets

gradMethod.ch: Scoring: 1. Class attendance 30％ 2. Mid-term exam 20％ 3. Final exam 20％ 4, Topical reports 30％
